posts.title: Post 1
posts.desc: AAAOm Nom and his friends need your help in his new colorful adventure! Help Om Nom gather his friends and share all the delicious sweets with them. To do this, you will have to combine the same cute monsters or candies to make them disappear from the board. Are you ready to help Om Nom and his friends and get the highest score?
